#summary A list of various resources involving code katas.

= What is code kata? =
Code Katas were originally created by Dave Thomas of the Pragmatic Programmers as small exercises/problems to solve
. They were generally small with an interesting twist, or two. You can find more information on the [http://codekata.pragprog.com/ Code Katas site].
